divs: Sighting DetailsI showed my mum the Jerusalem video very quickly as she was standing in the hall way because i thought it was interesting, she then replyed- "that is the exact thing me and that lady saw standing outside the bingo hall that i was telling you about" thats when i remembered she told me a couple of weeks ago she saw a glowing orb like ball of light beside 4 or 5 flashing lights, she said she watched them for a few mins before the clouds coverd them. She also said that the lady next to her said "can you see what i'm seeing" and my mum replyed "yes" I dont know if that video posted on youtube about the ball of light is fake or not but i was very surprised my mother knew what it was. My mother told me how herself and that lady standing having a cigarette, during the bingo interval were the only ones outside and how she wished at that moment she had a video or a phone. My mum is not interested in that sort of thing, and i only ever look at the odd videos recomended on the net. And find it a wierd coincidence that she related to it.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Glasgow
There were no other sightings in Glasgow on or around January 5th 2011
Summary: my mum saw the exact same thing as the jerusalem video posted jan 2011
